attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the re-introduction of capital punishment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After a number of high-profile, horrific murders over the past few years we have decided enough is enough and that the people should be asked whether they would like capital punishment to be re-introduced for murder.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
